sqlMap.select: select * from user_inf where flatId=#username# and pf LIKE #pf# ORDER BY userId DESC limit 1;
select * from user_inf where flatId=#username# and pf=#pf# ORDER BY userId DESC limit 1;
select * from user_inf where (flatId=#flatId# and pf=#pf#) OR (`identity`=#unionId# and pf LIKE #unionPf#) ORDER BY userId DESC limit 1;
SELECT userId,headimgurl,`name` as userName,isOnLine,sex FROM user_inf where userId = #userId#;
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE user_extendinf
cdk=#cdk#
extend=#extend#
myConsume=#myConsume#
shengMoney=#shengMoney#
prizeFlag=#prizeFlag#
name=#name#
totalMoney=#totalMoney#
bindSongCard=#bindSongCard#
lastUpNameTime=#lastUpNameTime#
lastUpHeadimgTime=#lastUpHeadimgTime#
WHERE userId=#userId#
sqlMap.select: select * from user_inf where identity=#identity#;
select * from user_inf where userId=#userId# limit 1;
select count(1) c from user_inf where enterServer > 0 and isOnLine!=0 and userId in ($userIds$);
select userId from user_inf where enterServer > 0 and isOnLine=0 and userId in ($userIds$);
select userId,`name` as userName , headimgurl from user_inf where userId IN ($userIds$);
sqlMap.insert:
insert into user_inf (`userId`,`flatId`,`name`,`loginDays`,`sex`,`headimgurl`,`pf`,`pw`,`playedSid`,`sessCode`,`regTime`,`logTime`,`config`,`freeCards`,`regBindId`,`os`,`identity`,`headimgraw`,`gameSiteTableId`,`payBindId`,`payBindTime`,`channel`,`loginExtend`,`deviceCode`,`isRobot`) VALUES (#userId#,#flatId#,#name#,#loginDays#,#sex#,#headimgurl#,#pf#,#pw#,#playedSid#,#sessCode#, now(), now(), #config#,#freeCards#,#regBindId#,#os#,#identity#,#headimgraw#,#gameSiteTableId#,#payBindId#,#payBindTime#,#channel#,#loginExtend#,#deviceCode#,#isRobot#)
select userId from user_inf where flatId=#flatId# and pf=#pf#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE user_inf
cards=cards+#cards#
freeCards=freeCards+#freeCards#
payBindId=#payBindId#
loginExtend=#loginExtend#
payBindTime=#payBindTime#
coin = coin + #coin#
freeCoin = freeCoin + #freeCoin#
WHERE userId =#userId#

UPDATE user_inf
gameSiteTableId=#gameSiteTableId#
headimgraw=#headimgraw#
loginExtend=#loginExtend#
name=#name#
sex=#sex#
enterServer=#enterServer#
headimgurl=#headimgurl#
pf=#pf#
pw=#pw#
playedSid=#playedSid#
sessCode=#sessCode#
regTime = #regTime#
logTime = #logTime#
ip = #ip#
mac = #mac#
deviceCode = #deviceCode#
syvc = #syvc#
flatId=#flatId#
identity=#identity#
cards=#cards#
regBindId=#regBindId#
syncTime=#syncTime#
logoutTime=#logoutTime#
pay=#pay#
payBindId=#payBindId#
payBindTime=#payBindTime#
config=#config#
playingTableId=#playingTableId#
config=#config#
extend=#extend#
loginDays=loginDays+#loginDays#
activity=#activity#
record=#record#
drawLottery=#drawLottery#
usedCards=#usedCards#
os=#os#
totalCount=#totalCount#
preLoginTime=#preLoginTime#
channel=#channel#
totalBureau=#totalBureau#
phoneNum=#phoneNum#
phonePw=#phonePw#
isReceiveBDAward=#isReceiveBDAward#
goldRoomGroupId=#goldRoomGroupId#
accName=#accName#
accPwd=#accPwd#
WHERE userId = #userId#
sqlMap.select: select max(userId) from user_inf
select phone from user_promotion where phone=#phone#
select userId from user_promotion where userId=#userId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into user_extendinf (userId, cdk, extend, myConsume, shengMoney, prizeFlag, name, totalMoney, bindSongCard) VALUES (#userId#, #cdk#, #extend#, #myConsume#, #shengMoney#, #prizeFlag#, #name#, #totalMoney#, #bindSongCard#) on duplicate key update cdk = #cdk#, extend = #extend#, myConsume = #myConsume#, shengMoney = #shengMoney#, prizeFlag = #prizeFlag#, name = #name#, totalMoney = #totalMoney#, bindSongCard = #bindSongCard#
sqlMap.select: select cdk from user_extendinf where userId=#userId#
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from user_extendinf where userId=#userId#
select * from pay_back where flatid=#flatid#;
select * from system_cdk where cdkid=#cdkid#;
sqlMap.update: update system_cdk set flatid=#flatid#, serverid=#serverid#,cdk_type=#cdkType#,get_time=sysdate() where cdkid=#cdkid#
sqlMap.select: select ip ,count(1) as count from mobile_reg group by ip
select mac ,count(1) as count from mobile_reg group by mac
select -usedCards from user_inf where userId=#userId#;
sqlMap.update: update user_inf set cards=cards+#cards# where userId=#userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(userId) as mynum FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date1# AND regTime <=#date2# AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) union all SELECT COUNT(userId) as mynum FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date1# AND regTime <=#date2# AND totalCount>=8 AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) union all SELECT COUNT(userId) as mynum FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date3# AND regTime <=#date4# AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) union all SELECT COUNT(userId) as mynum FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date3# AND regTime <=#date4# AND totalCount>=8 AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) union all SELECT COALESCE(SUM(money),0) as mynum FROM hb_exchange_record WHERE userId=#inviterId# and state=2 union all SELECT COUNT(1) as mynum FROM hb_exchange_record WHERE userId=#inviterId# AND state=2 AND createTime >=#date5# AND createTime <=#date6#

SELECT userId,`name` as userName,headimgurl,regTime FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date1# AND regTime <=#date2# AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) ORDER BY userId DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(1) as mycount FROM hb_exchange_record WHERE userId=#userId# AND state=2 AND createTime >=#date1# AND createTime <=#date2#

SELECT COUNT(userId) as mynum FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date1# AND regTime <=#date2# AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) union all SELECT COUNT(userId) as mynum FROM user_inf WHERE regTime >=#date1# AND regTime <=#date2# AND totalCount>=8 AND identity IN (SELECT t.unionId FROM weixin_authorization t WHERE t.inviterId=#inviterId#) union all SELECT COALESCE(SUM(money),0) as mynum FROM hb_exchange_record WHERE userId=#inviterId# and state=2 union all SELECT COUNT(1) as mynum FROM hb_exchange_record WHERE userId=#inviterId# AND state=2 AND createTime >=#date3# AND createTime <=#date4#
SELECT * FROM hb_exchange_record WHERE userId=#userId# AND state=#state#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user_bind WHERE userId = #userId# AND bindType = 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_bind (userId, agencyId, createTime, createUserId, bindType) VALUES (#userId#,#agencyId#,#createTime#,#createUserId#,#bindType#)
sqlMap.update:
insert into t_user_extend (msgType,userId,msgKey,msgValue,msgDesc,msgState,createdTime,modifiedTime) VALUES (#msgType#,#userId#,#msgKey#,#msgValue#,#msgDesc#,#msgState#,#createdTime#,#modifiedTime#) on duplicate key update modifiedTime=#modifiedTime#
msgKey=#msgKey#
msgValue=#msgValue#
msgDesc=#msgDesc#
msgState=#msgState#
update t_user_extend set msgState=#msgState# where userId=#userId# AND msgType=#msgType#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM t_user_extend WHERE userId=#userId# AND msgType=#msgType#
SELECT * FROM t_user_extend WHERE userId=#userId#
sqlMap.update: INSERT INTO t_gold_user (userId, userName, userNickname, sex, headimgurl, headimgraw, playCount, playCountWin, playCountLose , playCountEven, freeGold, Gold, usedGold, exp, vipexp, signature, extend,regTime,lastLoginTime) VALUES (#userId#,#userName#,#userNickname#,#sex#,#headimgurl#, #headimgraw#,#playCount#, #playCountWin#,#playCountLose#,#playCountEven#,#freeGold#,#Gold#,#usedGold#,#exp#,#vipexp#,#signature#,#extend#,#regTime#,#lastLoginTime#) on duplicate key update Gold=Gold+#Gold#,freeGold=freeGold+#freeGold#
sqlMap.select: select userId from user_inf where identity=#identity# limit 1
SELECT userId,headimgurl,`name` as userName,isOnLine,sex,payBindId FROM user_inf where userId = #userId#;
select * from user_msg_verify where userId=#userId#;
select * from user_msg_verify where id=#id#;
select * from user_msg_verify where ip=#ip# ;
sqlMap.update: insert into user_msg_verify (userId,verifyCode,sendTime,phoneNum,isUse,ip) values(#userId#,#verifyCode#,#sendTime#,#phoneNum#,0,#ip#) on DUPLICATE key update verifyCode=#verifyCode#,sendTime=#sendTime#,phoneNum=#phoneNum#,isUse=0,ip=#ip#
update user_msg_verify set isUse=#isUse# where userId=#userId#;
sqlMap.select: select * from user_inf where phoneNum=#phoneNum# limit 1;
SELECT userId, phoneNum from user_inf WHERE phoneNum is not null ORDER BY userId asc LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from user_inf where userId=#userId# limit 1;
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select * from user_inf where phoneNum in ( $phoneNumList$ ) order by regTime ASC limit 1;
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ select userId from user_inf where phoneNum in ( $phoneNumList$ )
select userId,phoneNum from user_inf where userId in ( $userIdList$ )
/*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT cards,freeCards FROM user_inf where userId = #userId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE user_inf set cards = cards + #cards#, freeCards = freeCards + #freeCards# WHERE userId = #userId# AND cards = #oldCards# AND freeCards = #oldFreeCards# AND cards + #cards# >= 0 AND freeCards + #freeCards# >= 0;
sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT goldenBeans FROM user_inf where userId = #userId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE user_inf set goldenBeans = goldenBeans + #goldenBeans# WHERE userId = #userId# AND goldenBeans = #oldGoldenBeans# AND goldenBeans + #goldenBeans# >= 0
sqlMap.select: /*FORCE_MASTER*/ SELECT keyId , prop FROM t_robot_sys_prop where type = #type# AND used = 0 order by keyId asc limit #limitCount#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_robot_sys_prop set used = 1 WHERE keyId in ( $keyIdList$ )
sqlMap.select: SELECT userId,name,headimgurl,payBindTime,isCreateGroup FROM user_inf where payBindId=#userId#;
SELECT userId,name,headimgurl,payBindTime,isCreateGroup FROM user_inf where payBindId=#payBindId# and userId=#userId#;

select u.name,g.groupId,g.createdUser,g.groupName,ifnull(log.totalPay,0) as totalPay,ifnull(log.dataDate,#dataDate#) as dataDate from t_group g left join user_inf u on g.createdUser=u.userId left join log_group_commission log on g.createdUser=log.userId and log.groupid=g.groupid and log.dataDate=#dataDate# where u.payBindId =#payBindId# and g.parentGroup=0 order by g.createdTime desc
sqlMap.update: UPDATE user_inf set isCreateGroup = 1 WHERE userId=#userId# and payBindId=#payBindId#
UPDATE user_inf u1,authority a2 set u1.payBindId = #payBindId#,u1.payBindTime=now() where (select count(*) FROM authority where userId=#payBindId# and quanxianId=2) !=0 and u1.userId=#userId#
UPDATE t_group set groupId=#afterId# where groupId=#beforeId#;
UPDATE t_group_user set groupId=#afterId# where groupId=#beforeId#;
sqlMap.select: select u.payBindId FROM user_inf u left join t_group t on t.createdUser=u.userId where t.groupId=#groupId#
select * from user_inf where accName=#accName# ORDER BY userId DESC limit 1;
